short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI-based Tool that helps freelancers to generate a proposal for a job in Upwork using minimal inputs form user.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This AI-based Tool provides an easy and efficient way for freelancers to create a comprehensive proposal for a job in Upwork. The tool takes in user inputs such as the job heading and description as well as the user's professional experience and automatically generates a well-structured proposal for the freelancer to use.
